p: Turning now to composition, in addition to the response of CO 2 concentrations to CO 2 emissions, we include the very small “direct” oxidation of CH 4 and CO to CO 2. We also include the “indirect” CO 2 response to all other climate drivers via their impact on the carbon cycle (Gasser et al., 2017; see dashed arrows in Figure 1). Hence, all emissions affect the carbon cycle, though no others as greatly as direct emissions of CO 2.
